ED_Title: Further practical measures for the prevention of an arms race inouter space
ED_DecisionText: At its 37th plenary meeting, on 7 December 2020, the General Assembly, by a recorded vote of 152 to 3, with 30 abstentions (See A/75/PV.37 for the result of the voting.), on the recommendation of the First Committee (A/75/397, para.16.), recalling its resolution 74/34 of 12 December 2019 and other resolutions on this matter, decided to include in the provisional agenda of its seventy-sixth session, under the item entitled “Prevention of an arms race in outer space”, the sub-item entitled “Further practical measures for the prevention of an arms race in outer space”.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
